itunes:title: Fake News 172 - John Fetterman Interview Goes Wrong
title: Fake News 172 - John Fetterman Interview Goes Wrong
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
description:
Pennsylvania Senate candidate John Fetterman's NBC interview showed just how bad his stroke really was, Kanye West has gone full-on anti-Semitic and racist (and insane), Alex Jones owes the Sandy Hook parents a billion dollars, and an L.A. City Councilwoman had a private and very racist conversation recorded and leaked.
